SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, U.USER_ID, U.USER_EMAIL, U.CREATED_AT, U.UPDATED_AT, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_TEL, U.POINT, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT USERS.*, USER_INFO.USER_NAME, USER_INFO.USER_TEL, USER_INFO.USER_ADDRESS, USER_INFO.POINT FROM USERS, USER_INFO WHERE USERS.USER_ID = USER_INFO.USER_ID AND USERS.ROLE_ID = 5
AND USERS.USER_STATUS = 1
AND USERS.USER_STATUS =
1 2 3 4
AND
USERS.USER_EMAIL USER_INFO.USER_NAME USER_INFO.USER_TEL
LIKE #{search_word}
ORDER BY USER_INFO.USER_NAME ) U ) WHERE RNUM >=#{start} and RNUM <=#{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_EMAIL, U.CREATED_AT, U.UPDATED_AT, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_TEL, U.POINT, U.USER_ADDRESS, U.USER_STATUS FROM (SELECT USERS.*, USER_INFO.USER_NAME, USER_INFO.USER_TEL, USER_INFO.USER_ADDRESS, USER_INFO.POINT FROM USERS, USER_INFO WHERE USERS.USER_ID = USER_INFO.USER_ID AND USERS.ROLE_ID = 5
AND USERS.USER_STATUS = 1
AND USERS.USER_STATUS =
1 2 3 4
AND
USERS.USER_EMAIL USER_INFO.USER_NAME USER_INFO.USER_TEL
LIKE #{search_word}
ORDER BY USER_INFO.USER_NAME ) U )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, UIS.* FROM (SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_EMAIL, U.ROLE_ID,
UI.USER_NAME, UI.USER_TEL, UI.USER_ADDRESS,
S.OWNER_ID, S.STORE_ID, S.STORE_NAME, S.STORE_TEL, S.STORE_SAVED_IMAGE, S.STORE_ORIGINAL_IMAGE, S.STORE_ADDRESS_SI, S.STORE_ADDRESS_GU, S.STORE_ADDRESS_DONG, S.STORE_ADDRESS_ETC
FROM
USERS U INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON U.USER_ID = UI.USER_ID INNER JOIN STORES S ON UI.USER_ID = S.OWNER_ID
WHERE U.ROLE_ID = 3
AND
U.USER_EMAIL S.STORE_NAME S.STORE_TEL
LIKE #{search_word}
ORDER BY S.STORE_NAME ) U ) WHERE RNUM >=#{start} and RNUM <=#{end}
